name: Clin N
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in the field distant metastasis.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Deep inguinal, NOS
       Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
    Superficial inguinal (femoral) regional lymph node
    Inguinal node, NOS (unknown if superficial or deep)
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Unknown; not stated
Not documented in patient record
No palpable or visibly enlarged inguinal lymph nodes
Palpable mobile unilateral inguinal lymph node

Regional lymph nodes, not stated if single, multiple or bilateral:
 
SINGLE regional lymph node, NOS
Not stated if single or multiple lymph nodes 

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Palpable mobile multiple or bilateral inguinal lymph nodes

MULTIPLE or BILATERAL regional lymph nodes:
    
Stated as N2

Fixed inguinal nodal mass or pelvic lymphadenopathy
unilateral or bilateral
